characterDescription: Havrom is Fifth Battalionlord in Dalinar's army. He is recruited to assist in Dalinar's investigation of Sadeas by bringing forth those soldiers under his command who had spoken to Sadeas previously; the ones Sadeas had interviewed on the day Dalinar, Adolin, and their soldiers amongst them, were on their way to a plateau assault.

characterDetails.Appearance: Havrom has relatives amongst the Peakfolk, was built like a tower, and wore a beard with long sides after the Horneater fashion, chin clean-shaven.
